00045 /*
00046 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_SimpleAliasTable {
00047 
00048 public:
00049 
00050     EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f);
00051 
00052     ~EGS_SimpleAliasTable();
00053 
00054     int sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00055         int bin = (int) (rndm->getUniform()*n);
00056         return rndm->getUniform() < wi[bin] ? bin : bins[bin];
00057     };
00058 
00059     int       n;          //!< number of subintervals
00060     EGS_Float *wi;        //!< array of bin branching probabilities
00061     unsigned short *bins; //!< bins
00062 
00063 };
00064 
00065 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f) : n(0) {
00066     if( N < 1 ) return;
00067     n = N;
00068     wi = new EGS_Float [n]; bins = new unsigned short [n]; int i;
00069     double sum = 0; double *fcum = new double [n];
00070     for(i=0; i<n; ++i) { fcum[i] = f[i]; sum += fcum[i]; bins[i] = n+1; }
00071     sum /= n; int jh, jl;
00072     for(i=0; i<n-1; ++i) {
00073         for(jh=0; jh<n-1; jh++) {
00074             if( bins[jh] > n && fcum[jh] > sum ) break;
00075         }
00076         for(jl=0; jl<n-1; jl++) {
00077             if( bins[jl] > n && fcum[jl] < sum ) break;
00078         }
00079         double aux = sum - fcum[jl];
00080         fcum[jh] -= aux;
00081         wi[jl] = fcum[jl]/sum; bins[jl] = jh;
00082     }
00083     for(i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00084         if( bins[i] > n ) { bins[i] = i; wi[i] = 1; }
00085         //egsInformation("alias table: %d %d %g\n",i,bins[i],wi[i]);
00086     }
00087     delete [] fcum;
00088 }
00089 
00090 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::~EGS_SimpleAliasTable() {
00091     if( n > 0 ) { delete [] wi; delete [] bins; }
00092 }
00093 */
00094 
00095 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_ShellData {
00096 
00097 public:
00098 
00099     float           be;          
00100     unsigned short  type;        
00101     unsigned short  ntrans;      
00102     unsigned short *ttypes;      
00103     EGS_SimpleAliasTable *table; 
00104 
00105     EGS_ShellData() : ntrans(0), table(0) {};
00106     ~EGS_ShellData() {
00107         deleteData();
00108     }
00109 
00110     void deleteData() {
00111         if (ntrans > 0) {
00112             delete [] ttypes;
00113             ntrans = 0;
00114         }
00115         if (table) {
00116             delete table;
00117             table = 0;
00118         }
00119     };
00120 
00121     bool loadData(istream &data);
00122 
00123     int sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00124         return ttypes[table->sample(rndm)];
00125     };
00126 
00127 };
00128 
00129 bool EGS_ShellData::loadData(istream &data) {
00130     deleteData();
00131     char t;
00132     data.read((char *)&t,sizeof(char));
00133     type = t;
00134     data.read((char *)&ntrans,sizeof(short));
00135     data.read((char *)&be,sizeof(float));
00136     //egsInformation("shell is of type %d, has BE=%g and %d transitions\n",type,be,ntrans);
00137     if (data.fail() || ntrans > 10000) {
00138         ntrans = 0;
00139         return false;
00140     }
00141     if (ntrans == 0) {
00142         return true;
00143     }
00144     ttypes = new unsigned short [ntrans];
00145     EGS_Float *tmp = new EGS_Float [ntrans];
00146     float aux;
00147     for (int i=0; i<ntrans; ++i) {
00148         data.read((char *)&ttypes[i],sizeof(unsigned short));
00149         data.read((char *)&aux,sizeof(float));
00150         tmp[i] = aux;
00151         //egsInformation("got transition %d with p=%g\n",ttypes[i],aux);
00152     }
00153     if (data.fail()) {
00154         delete [] tmp;
00155         deleteData();
00156         return false;
00157     }
00158     table = new EGS_SimpleAliasTable(ntrans,tmp);
00159     delete [] tmp;
00160     return true;
00161 }

00163 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_ElementRelaxData {
00164 
00165 public:
00166 
00167     EGS_ElementRelaxData() : Z(0), nshell(0), shells(0) {};
00168 
00169     ~EGS_ElementRelaxData() {
00170         deleteData();
00171     };
00172 
00173     int loadData(int iZ, istream &data);
00174 
00175 
00176     unsigned short       Z;          
00177     unsigned short       nshell;     
00178     EGS_ShellData       *shells;     
00179 
00180     void deleteData() {
00181         if (nshell > 0) {
00182             delete [] shells;
00183         }
00184         Z = 0;
00185         nshell = 0;
00186         shells = 0;
00187     };
00188 
00189 };
00190 
00191 int EGS_ElementRelaxData::loadData(int iZ, istream &data) {
00192     if (iZ == Z) {
00193         return 0;
00194     }
00195     deleteData();
00196     Z = iZ;
00197     int pos = 2 + (Z-1)*sizeof(int);
00198     data.seekg(pos,ios::beg);
00199     data.read((char *)&pos,sizeof(int));
00200     if (data.fail()) {
00201         egsWarning("Failed reading position for element %d\n",Z);
00202         Z = 0;
00203         return 5;
00204     }
00205     data.seekg(pos,ios::beg);
00206     data.read((char *)&nshell,sizeof(nshell));
00207     if (data.fail() || nshell < 1 || nshell > 63) {
00208         egsWarning("Failed reading number of shells for Z=%d (got %d shells and fail()=%d\n",
00209                    Z,nshell,data.fail());
00210         nshell = 0;
00211         return 6;
00212     }
00213     //egsInformation("element %d has %d shells\n",Z,nshell);
00214     shells = new EGS_ShellData [nshell];
00215     for (int j=0; j<nshell; ++j) {
00216         if (!shells[j].loadData(data)) {
00217             egsWarning("Failed loading data for shell %d of element %d\n",j+1,Z);
00218             deleteData();
00219             return 7;
00220         }
00221     }
00222     return 0;
00223 }
00224 
00225 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_RelaxImplementation {
00226 
00227 public:
00228 
00229     EGS_RelaxImplementation(const char *data_path) : elements(0), nz(0) {
00230         data_file = egsJoinPath(data_path,"relax.data");
00231     };
00232 
00233     ~EGS_RelaxImplementation() {
00234         if (nz > 0) {
00235             for (int j=0; j<nz; ++j) {
00236                 if (elements[j]) {
00237                     delete elements[j];
00238                 }
00239             }
00240             delete [] elements;
00241         }
00242     };
00243 
00244     int loadData(int Z);
00245     int loadData(int Z, istream &data);
00246     int loadData(int Nz, const int *Zarray);
00247     int loadAllData();
00248 
00249     int openDataFile(istream **data);
00250 
00251     void checkData(int Z, int shell) {
00252         static const char *func_name = "checkData";
00253         if (!elements)
00254             if (loadData(Z)) egsFatal("%s: failed to load data for Z=%d\n",
00255                                           func_name,Z);
00256         if (Z < 1 || Z > nz)
00257             egsFatal("%s: Z=%d is outside of initialized range 1...%d\n",
00258                      func_name,Z,nz);
00259         if (shell < 0 || shell >= elements[Z-1]->nshell)
00260             egsFatal("%s: element %d has %d shells but you are asking for "
00261                      "shell %d\n",func_name,Z,elements[Z-1]->nshell,shell);
00262     };
00263 
00264     void relax(int Z, int sh, EGS_Float ecut, EGS_Float pcut,
00265                EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, double &edep,
00266                EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_RelaxationParticle> &particles) {
00267         checkData(Z,sh);
00268         EGS_Float minE = pcut < ecut ? pcut : ecut;
00269         relax(Z,sh,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00270     };
00271 
00272     EGS_Float bindingEnergy(int Z, int shell) {
00273         checkData(Z,shell);
00274         return elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be;
00275     };
00276 
00277     void setBindingEnergy(int Z, int shell, EGS_Float new_be) {
00278         checkData(Z,shell);
00279         elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be = new_be;
00280     };
00281 
00282     EGS_Float getMaxGammaEnergy(int Z, int shell) {
00283         checkData(Z,shell);
00284         int ntrans = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ntrans;
00285         if (ntrans < 1) {
00286             return 0;
00287         }
00288         EGS_Float E = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be;
00289         EGS_Float emax = 0;
00290         for (int j=0; j<ntrans; ++j) {
00291             int transition = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ttypes[j];
00292             if (transition < 64) {
00293                 EGS_Float Egamma = E - elements[Z-1]->shells[transition].be;
00294                 if (Egamma > emax) {
00295                     emax = Egamma;
00296                 }
00297             }
00298         }
00299         return emax;
00300     };
00301 
00302     EGS_Float getMaxElectronEnergy(int Z, int shell) {
00303         checkData(Z,shell);
00304         int ntrans = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ntrans;
00305         if (ntrans < 1) {
00306             return 0;
00307         }
00308         EGS_Float E = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be;
00309         EGS_Float emax = 0;
00310         for (int j=0; j<ntrans; ++j) {
00311             int transition = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ttypes[j];
00312             if (transition >= 64) {
00313                 int sh1 = (transition >> 6);
00314                 int sh2 = transition - (sh1 << 6);
00315                 EGS_Float Eelec = E - (elements[Z-1]->shells[sh1].be +
00316                                        elements[Z-1]->shells[sh2].be);
00317                 if (Eelec > emax) {
00318                     emax = Eelec;
00319                 }
00320             }
00321         }
00322         return emax;
00323     };
00324 
00325     void relax(int Z, int sh, EGS_Float minE, EGS_Float ecut, EGS_Float pcut,
00326                EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, double &edep,
00327                EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_RelaxationParticle> &particles) {
00328         EGS_Float E = elements[Z-1]->shells[sh].be;
00329         //egsInformation("relax(%d,%d): E=%g minE=%g\n",Z,sh,E,minE);
00330         if (E <= minE || elements[Z-1]->shells[sh].ntrans < 1) {
00331             //egsInformation("relax: terminating\n");
00332             edep += E;
00333             return;
00334         }
00335         int transition = elements[Z-1]->shells[sh].sample(rndm);
00336         //egsInformation("relax: got transition %d\n",transition);
00337         if (transition < 64) {
00338             EGS_Float Egamma = E - elements[Z-1]->shells[transition].be;
00339             //egsInformation("->flourescence, Egamma=%g\n",Egamma);
00340             if (Egamma > pcut) {
00341                 EGS_RelaxationParticle p(0,Egamma);
00342                 particles.add(p);
00343             }
00344             else {
00345                 edep += Egamma;
00346             }
00347             relax(Z,transition,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00348         }
00349         else {
00350             int sh1 = (transition >> 6);
00351             int sh2 = transition - (sh1 << 6);
00352             EGS_Float Eelec = E - elements[Z-1]->shells[sh1].be - elements[Z-1]->shells[sh2].be;
00353             //egsInformation("->Auger, sh1=%d sh2=%d E=%g\n",sh1,sh2,Eelec);
00354             if (Eelec > ecut) {
00355                 EGS_RelaxationParticle p(-1,Eelec);
00356                 particles.add(p);
00357             }
00358             else {
00359                 edep += Eelec;
00360             }
00361             relax(Z,sh1,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00362             relax(Z,sh2,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00363         }
00364     };
00365 
00366     EGS_ElementRelaxData **elements;
00367     string               data_file;
00368     int                  nz;
00369 
00370 };
00371 
00372 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::openDataFile(istream **the_data) {
00373     static const char *func_name = "EGS_RelaxImplementation::openDataFile()";
00374     *the_data = 0;
00375     ifstream *data = new ifstream(data_file.c_str(),ios::binary);
00376     if (!(*data)) {
00377         egsWarning("%s: failed to open data file %s\n",
00378                    func_name,data_file.c_str());
00379         return 1;
00380     }
00381     short Nz;
00382     data->read((char *)&Nz,sizeof(short));
00383     if (data->fail() || Nz < 1 || Nz > 200) {
00384         egsWarning("%s: failed reading first record from %s\n",
00385                    func_name,data_file.c_str());
00386         return 2;
00387     }
00388     if (Nz > nz) {
00389         EGS_ElementRelaxData **new_elements = new EGS_ElementRelaxData* [Nz];
00390         if (nz > 0) {
00391             for (int j=0; j<nz; ++j) {
00392                 new_elements[j] = elements[j];
00393             }
00394             delete [] elements;
00395         }
00396         else {
00397             for (int j=0; j<Nz; ++j) {
00398                 new_elements[j] = 0;
00399             }
00400         }
00401         elements = new_elements;
00402         nz = Nz;
00403     }
00404     *the_data = data;
00405     return 0;
00406 }

00408 
00409 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData(int Z) {
00410     static const char *func_name = "EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData()";
00411     if (Z < 1) {
00412         egsWarning("%s: called with Z=%d?\n",func_name,Z);
00413         return 3;
00414     }
00415     istream *the_data;
00416     int res = openDataFile(&the_data);
00417     if (res || !the_data) {
00418         return res;
00419     }
00420     istream &data = *the_data;
00421     if (Z > nz) {
00422         egsWarning("%s: called with Z=%d, but I only have data for Z<=%d.\n",
00423                    func_name,Z,nz);
00424         return 4;
00425     }
00426     res = loadData(Z,data);
00427     delete the_data;
00428     return res;
00429 }
00430 
00431 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData(int Z, istream &data) {
00432     if (elements[Z-1]) {
00433         return 0;
00434     }
00435     elements[Z-1] = new EGS_ElementRelaxData;
00436     return elements[Z-1]->loadData(Z,data);
00437 }
00438 
00439 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData(int Nz, const int *Zarray) {
00440     istream *the_data;
00441     int res = openDataFile(&the_data);
00442     if (res || !the_data) {
00443         return res;
00444     }
00445     istream &data = *the_data;
00446     for (int j=0; j<Nz; ++j) {
00447         res = loadData(Zarray[j],data);
00448         if (res) {
00449             break;
00450         }
00451     }
00452     delete the_data;
00453     return res;
00454 }
00455 
00456 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadAllData() {
00457     istream *the_data;
00458     int res = openDataFile(&the_data);
00459     if (res || !the_data) {
00460         return res;
00461     }
00462     istream &data = *the_data;
00463     for (int Z=1; Z<=nz; ++Z) {
00464         res = loadData(Z,data);
00465         if (res) {
00466             break;
00467         }
00468     }
00469     delete the_data;
00470     return res;
00471 }
00472 
00473 EGS_AtomicRelaxations::EGS_AtomicRelaxations(const char *data_path) {
00474     string path;
00475     if (!data_path) {
00476         EGS_Application *app = EGS_Application::activeApplication();
00477         if (app) {
00478             path = egsJoinPath(app->getHenHouse(),"data");
00479         }
00480         else {
00481             char *hen_house = getenv("HEN_HOUSE");
00482             if (!hen_house) {
00483                 egsWarning("EGS_AtomicRelaxations::EGS_AtomicRelaxations: "
00484                            "no active application and HEN_HOUSE not defined.\n"
00485                            "  assuming local directory for relax data\n");
00486                 path = "./";
00487             }
00488             else {
00489                 path = egsJoinPath(hen_house,"data");
00490             }
00491         }
00492     }
00493     else {
00494         path = data_path;
00495     }
00496     p = new EGS_RelaxImplementation(path.c_str());
00497 }
00498 
00499 EGS_AtomicRelaxations::~EGS_AtomicRelaxations() {
00500     delete p;
00501 }
